svg.text: What do you and your classmates frequently do? In groups, brainstorm a list of sentences
describing activities you frequently do and where you do them. Use the Word Bank below to
help you. Compare your list with another group. Are there similarities or differences?
(xīn) means “heart.” Characters that include this component
often relate to thoughts or feelings. As a component, it often appears in the
when it appears on the left side
